metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12522 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Squid through 4.7. When Squid is run as root, it spawns its child processes as a lesser user, by default the user nobody. This is done via the leave_suid call. leave_suid leaves the Saved UID as 0. This makes it trivial for an attacker who has compromised the child process to escalate their privileges back to root.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2021-09-07, there is no fix from upstream for this issue

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
